conversation.content: Hi! Um, so like, hmm, fifth time this year? Let me see here... uh, we're movin' again.
Oh wow, um, fifth time—that's, uh, that's a lot. I'm gonna—wait, let me pull up your account here—actually, what's your account number or, um, phone number on file?
It's, uh, wait. Hmm. Which one d'you need? See, that's the thing—
Either one works! I can look you up with—sorry, I mean, um, whatever's easier for you. I know with all the moves it gets, uh... confusing.
Okay so, um, lemme think... 555-0342? That still right? Or wait, hmm, might be the old one.
Perfect, got you right here! Account ACC-7749-MN2. And, um, I can see you've had—oh gosh—yeah, four address changes since January. Military family?
Yep! Navy wife. Fun times, right? So anyway, um, how quick can we—
Oh, I totally get it. My brother's Air Force, so... yeah, I know, it's ridiculous how often you have to move. Um, so I'm gonna make sure—let me set up something here that'll help. Your new address?
Um, hmm, 4421 Base Road. But wait. How do I know this won't just... mess everythin' up?

So, um, I'm setting you up with our, uh, military family profile code—MIL-PREF-0923—which basically means, um, next time you call? You just give them that code and we can update everything in like... thirty seconds instead of all this.
Really? That's—hmm, okay but like, why didn't anyone tell me 'bout this before?
Because honestly? Um, half our reps don't even—sorry, they don't know about it. It's not really, uh... advertised. But I'm making sure you're protected for next time.
Wait, so you're tellin' me, um, there's been a code this whole time? Hmm. Seems suspicious.

I know, I know how it sounds. But look, um, I'm putting a note here—NOTE-85542-JK—that says, uh, "frequent military relocations, priority handling required" so even if you don't remember the code, anyone who pulls this up will... you know...
Okay so, um, lemme get this straight. You're like, actually helpin'? Not just, hmm, readin' a script?

Um, yeah, no, I'm—look, moving five times in a year is, uh, it's insane, and our system makes it worse. So I'm updating your address to 4421 Base Road, confirmation CNF-2290-BASE, and, um, adding every single flag I can to make your life easier because... that's just ridiculous what you're dealing with.
Ha! Y'know what? I like you. Um, so, hmm, what if we move again next month?

Then you call, give them code MIL-PREF-0923 or reference, um, today's interaction ID INT-445821, and they'll... sorry, WE'LL get you sorted immediately. Also I'm waiving the, uh, the address change fee that's been charged to you the last four times because that's just...
Wait wait wait. There's been FEES? Um, hmm, nobody said—how much we talkin' here?

So you've been charged, um, fifteen dollars each time—total of sixty dollars—which is, uh, absolutely getting refunded. Credit ref CRD-9901-RFND will show up in, um, three to five days. Military families shouldn't pay to... to update addresses when you're literally serving the country, that's just...
